channel.title: Help please ::item command
channel.description: how do i make my item commands rights lower . i changed the rights to 1 and still my moderators cannot spawn.Please Help

item.title: Help please ::item command
item.dc:creator: @avirunes avirunes
item.description:
@avirunes wrote:

[quote=“Mee0345, post:2, topic:380708”]hmmmm
post your command?
if (command.startsWith(“item”) && playerRights > 1) {
String[] args = command.split(" ");
if(args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sM(“No such item.”);
}
} else {
sM(“Errr… You did it wrong. Its ::item ID AMMOUNT”);
}
}

That will work.
If not post your problem[/quote]

change > 1 to >= 1 as he wants mods to be able to spawn

Read full topic

item.title: Help please ::item command
item.dc:creator: @Mee0345 Mee0345
item.description:
@Mee0345 wrote:

hmmmm
post your command?
if (command.startsWith(“item”) && playerRights > 1) {
String[] args = command.split(" ");
if(args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sM(“No such item.”);
}
} else {
sM(“Errr… You did it wrong. Its ::item ID AMMOUNT”);
}
}

That will work.
If not post your problem

Read full topic
